document.masterDocTitle: Checklist of the Pipunculidae (Diptera) of mainland France: further faunistic records and description of a new species

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Checklist of the Pipunculidae (Diptera) of mainland France: further faunistic records and description of a new species

mods:name.mods:affiliation: Amis de la réserve naturelle du lac de Remoray, 28 rue de Mouthe, 25160 Labergement-Sainte-Marie, France. jocelyn. claude @ espaces-naturels. fr; https: // orcid. org / 0000 - 0002 - 7944 - 2324

heading.emphasis: Pipunculidae species new to mainland France

subSubSection.paragraph:
Chalarus leticiae
Kehlmaier, 2003
. Examined material: Hautes-Alpes, Pra, Abries-Ristolas, 1♀ ,
19.vii.2019
(coll. PW), 1♀ , 19.vii.2019 ;
Alpes-Maritimes, PNM , Saint-Dalmas-le-Selvage, 1♀ ,
15.ix.2009
;
Doubs, RNRV , Cléron, 1♀ ,
14.ix.2017
.

Claraeola agnosta Kehlmaier, 2005
. Examined material: Ain, Culoz, 1 ♂ (CK869),
17.v.2012
(coll. PW ).

Claraeola melanostola ( Becker, 1897 )
. Examined material: Eure-et-Loir, Fontenay-sur-Conie, 1♂ , 1♀ , 12.ix.2019 (coll. JF).

. Examined material: Ain, ENSC ,

8.vii.2015
(coll. PW )
.

Tomosvaryella estebani
sp. nov. Examined material:
Jura , RNCM , Lons-le-Saunier, Macornay; Yonne, RNBP , Mailly-le-château; Hautes-Alpes, Forêt de Boscon, Crots, see above.

Tomosvaryella kalevala Kehlmaier, 2008
. Examined material: Doubs, CB , Chapelle-des-Bois, 1♂ , 2.v.2017 (coll. JC ). Note : This observation confirms the boreal-alpine distribution of
T. kalevala
, known so far from Finland and Russia (Kehlmaier, 2008). Some years ago, a female of
T. kalevala
was found in the Bavarian Forest of Germany (pers. comm. of Christian Kehlmaier to Jocelyn Claude).

. Examined material: Ain, ENSC , Mijoux, 1ns,
21.vii.2015
;
Alpes-Maritimes, PNM , Saorge, 1♀ ,
15.x.2010
;
Doubs, RNRV , Chassagne-Saint-Denis, 1ns, 1996, RNLR , Remoray-Boujeons, 1ns,
23.viii.2010
, 1ns, 6.x.2011 .

Tomosvaryella sepulta
De Meyer, 1997
. Examined material: Alpes-Maritimes, Valbonne, 1♂ ,
23.viii.2006
(coll. BN).
